lernhilfe2013ss.tree

Class QadTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • lernhilfe2013ss.tree.QadTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class QadTree
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents a simple tree. Each node of the tree is identified by a string.
    This implementation is restricted to a maximum of 44 nodes (including root).

    Legal use of this class is restricted to course members in the actual courses. Use of this class is on your own risk. No guaranty of any kind.
    Author:
    Prof. Dr. Joachim Schimkat, Berlin, Germany, 2013
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
